languages.text: {n}Вид-скрины очищаются от текста и на долгое мгновение в этой странной беседе возникает пауза. Затем кибергоргулья, в пасти которой все еще зажата ваша рука, склоняет голову — словно бы понуро.{/n} "///Номос не желают ссоры. Номос хотят помочь. Скажи нам, что нам сделать?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Вид-скрины очищаются от текста и на долгое мгновение в этой странной беседе возникает пауза. Затем кибергоргулья, в пасти которой все еще зажата ваша рука, склоняет голову — словно бы понуро.{/n} "///Номос не желают ссоры. Номос хотят помочь. Скажи нам, что нам сделать?"
traits.speaker: NomosSpeaker_NoVisual

languages.text: {n}The text on the vid-screens clears, and a long pause occurs in this bizarre conversation. Then the cybergargoyle, whose maw is still clutching your hand, lowers its head... dejectedly?{/n} "///Nomos do not want to quarrel. Nomos want to help. Tell us, what should we do?"
languages.original_text: {n}Вид-скрины очищаются от текста и на долгое мгновение в этой странной беседе возникает пауза. Затем кибергоргулья, в пасти которой все еще зажата ваша рука, склоняет голову — словно бы понуро.{/n} "///Номос не желают ссоры. Номос хотят помочь. Скажи нам, что нам сделать?"

traits.locale_text: {n}The text on the vid-screens clears, and a long pause occurs in this bizarre conversation. Then the cybergargoyle, whose maw is still clutching your hand, lowers its head... dejectedly?{/n} "///Nomos do not want to quarrel. Nomos want to help. Tell us, what should we do?"
traits.speaker: NomosSpeaker_NoVisual

traits.locale_text: {n}The text on the vid-screens clears, and a long pause occurs in this bizarre conversation. Then the cybergargoyle, whose maw is still clutching your hand, lowers its head... dejectedly?{/n} "///Nomos do not want to quarrel. Nomos want to help. Tell us, what should we do?"

traits.locale_text: {n}The text on the vid-screens clears, and a long pause occurs in this bizarre conversation. Then the cybergargoyle, whose maw is still clutching your hand, lowers its head... dejectedly?{/n} "///Nomos do not want to quarrel. Nomos want to help. Tell us, what should we do?"

traits.locale_text: {n}The text on the vid-screens clears, and a long pause occurs in this bizarre conversation. Then the cybergargoyle, whose maw is still clutching your hand, lowers its head... dejectedly?{/n} "///Nomos do not want to quarrel. Nomos want to help. Tell us, what should we do?"
traits.speaker: NomosSpeaker_NoVisual

languages.text: {n}スクリーン上の文字が消え、この奇妙な会話がしばし中断した。そして吸い込み口であなたの手をしっかりと捕らえているサイバーガーゴイルがその頭を下げたのは…落胆しているのだろうか？{/n}「///ノモスは口論を好みません。ノモスは助けたいと思っています。我々は何をすればいいのか？教えてください」
languages.original_text: {n}The text on the vid-screens clears, and a long pause occurs in this bizarre conversation. Then the cybergargoyle, whose maw is still clutching your hand, lowers its head... dejectedly?{/n} "///Nomos do not want to quarrel. Nomos want to help. Tell us, what should we do?"

traits.locale_text: {n}スクリーン上の文字が消え、この奇妙な会話がしばし中断した。そして吸い込み口であなたの手をしっかりと捕らえているサイバーガーゴイルがその頭を下げたのは…落胆しているのだろうか？{/n}「///ノモスは口論を好みません。ノモスは助けたいと思っています。我々は何をすればいいのか？教えてください」
traits.speaker: NomosSpeaker_NoVisual

languages.text: {n}视讯屏幕上的文字消失了，你们之间古怪的对话出现了长时间的停顿。随后，电子滴水嘴兽低下了头，它的嘴巴还在咬着你的手……看起来很沮丧？{/n}“///诺莫斯不想吵架，诺莫斯想帮忙。告诉我们，我们该怎么办？”
languages.original_text: {n}The text on the vid-screens clears, and a long pause occurs in this bizarre conversation. Then the cybergargoyle, whose maw is still clutching your hand, lowers its head... dejectedly?{/n} "///Nomos do not want to quarrel. Nomos want to help. Tell us, what should we do?"

traits.locale_text: {n}视讯屏幕上的文字消失了，你们之间古怪的对话出现了长时间的停顿。随后，电子滴水嘴兽低下了头，它的嘴巴还在咬着你的手……看起来很沮丧？{/n}“///诺莫斯不想吵架，诺莫斯想帮忙。告诉我们，我们该怎么办？”
traits.speaker: NomosSpeaker_NoVisual

languages.text: {n}Der Text auf dem Vid-Bildschirm verschwindet und es kommt zu einer langen Pause in dieser bizarren Unterhaltung. Dann senkt der Cybergargoyle, dessen Schlund noch immer deine Hand umklammert hält, den Kopf, und zwar fast ... niedergeschlagen?{/n} "///Nomos wollen nicht streiten. Nomos wollen helfen. Sagt uns, was sollen wir tun?"
languages.original_text: {n}The text on the vid-screens clears, and a long pause occurs in this bizarre conversation. Then the cybergargoyle, whose maw is still clutching your hand, lowers its head... dejectedly?{/n} "///Nomos do not want to quarrel. Nomos want to help. Tell us, what should we do?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Der Text auf dem Vid-Bildschirm verschwindet und es kommt zu einer langen Pause in dieser bizarren Unterhaltung. Dann senkt der Cybergargoyle, dessen Schlund noch immer deine Hand umklammert hält, den Kopf, und zwar fast ... niedergeschlagen?{/n} "///Nomos wollen nicht streiten. Nomos wollen helfen. Sagt uns, was sollen wir tun?"
traits.speaker: NomosSpeaker_NoVisual

languages.text: {n}Le texte disparaît des écrans et un long silence s'installe dans cette étrange conversation. Puis la cybergargouille, qui tient toujours votre main dans sa gueule, baisse la tête d'un air... dépité ?{/n} « ///Nous ne voulons pas nous quereller. Nous voulons aider. Dites-nous ce que nous devons faire. »
languages.original_text: {n}The text on the vid-screens clears, and a long pause occurs in this bizarre conversation. Then the cybergargoyle, whose maw is still clutching your hand, lowers its head... dejectedly?{/n} "///Nomos do not want to quarrel. Nomos want to help. Tell us, what should we do?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Le texte disparaît des écrans et un long silence s'installe dans cette étrange conversation. Puis la cybergargouille, qui tient toujours votre main dans sa gueule, baisse la tête d'un air... dépité ?{/n} « ///Nous ne voulons pas nous quereller. Nous voulons aider. Dites-nous ce que nous devons faire. »
traits.speaker: NomosSpeaker_NoVisual

languages.text: {n}El texto de las videopantallas se borra, y se produce una larga pausa en esta insólita conversación. Luego la cibergárgola, cuyas mandíbulas aún retienen tu mano, baja la cabeza... ¿apesadumbrada?{/n} «///Nomos no quieren discutir. Nomos quieren ayudar. Díganos, ¿qué debemos hacer?».
languages.original_text: {n}The text on the vid-screens clears, and a long pause occurs in this bizarre conversation. Then the cybergargoyle, whose maw is still clutching your hand, lowers its head... dejectedly?{/n} "///Nomos do not want to quarrel. Nomos want to help. Tell us, what should we do?"

traits.locale_text: {n}El texto de las videopantallas se borra, y se produce una larga pausa en esta insólita conversación. Luego la cibergárgola, cuyas mandíbulas aún retienen tu mano, baja la cabeza... ¿apesadumbrada?{/n} «///Nomos no quieren discutir. Nomos quieren ayudar. Díganos, ¿qué debemos hacer?».
traits.speaker: NomosSpeaker_NoVisual

languages.text: {n}Video ekranlardaki metin siliniyor, tuhaf konuşmada uzun bir duraksama yaşanıyor. Sonrasında çenesi hâlâ elini sıkıca kavramış olan sibergargoyl, hevesi kırılmışçasına kafasını eğiyor.{/n} "///Nomos, münakaşa etmek istemiyor. Nomos, yardım etmek istiyor. Söyleyin bize, ne yapmalıyız?"
languages.original_text: {n}The text on the vid-screens clears, and a long pause occurs in this bizarre conversation. Then the cybergargoyle, whose maw is still clutching your hand, lowers its head... dejectedly?{/n} "///Nomos do not want to quarrel. Nomos want to help. Tell us, what should we do?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Video ekranlardaki metin siliniyor, tuhaf konuşmada uzun bir duraksama yaşanıyor. Sonrasında çenesi hâlâ elini sıkıca kavramış olan sibergargoyl, hevesi kırılmışçasına kafasını eğiyor.{/n} "///Nomos münakaşa etmek istemiyor. Nomos yardım etmek istiyor. Söyleyin bize, ne yapmalıyız?"
traits.speaker: NomosSpeaker_NoVisual
